name: hijri-converter
title: Hijri Converter
description: Convert dates between Hijri (Islamic) and Gregorian calendars with live preview, calendar view, and menu bar access.
author: adel_enazi

commands.name: convert-date
commands.title: Convert Hijri to Gregorian
commands.description: Convert a Hijri date to Gregorian with live preview

commands.name: gregorian-to-hijri
commands.title: Convert Gregorian to Hijri
commands.description: Convert a Gregorian date to Hijri with live preview

commands.name: show-today
commands.title: Show Today's Date
commands.description: Display today's date in both Hijri and Gregorian calendars

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Show Hijri Date in Menu Bar
commands.description: Display the current Hijri date in the menu bar

commands.name: hijri-calendar
commands.title: View Hijri Calendar
commands.description: View upcoming days in the Hijri calendar

echo "

" && exit 1
